attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned call upon the government to ban factory farming of all animals.

We believe this practice is barbaric and the suffering inflicted on animals is abuse. 

If we inflicted this type of suffering and conditions on family pets we would be prosecuted for animal cruelty, therefore those that factory farm animals should also be prosecuted for cruelty to animals.

We believe that all animals should live a natural life without suffering.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban factory farming"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14622.asp

Prime Minister's Office
